summary: A series of faxed timesheets and invoices from Nicole Hesse detailing hours worked and tasks performed for property management and staff coordination at a residence associated with Jeffrey Epstein, spanning from September 2003 to August 2005. The document shows logistical support for the household, including coordinating workers, handling mail, and interacting with Epstein's staff.

persons.name: Nicole Hesse
persons.context: The sender of the faxed timesheets, detailing hours worked performing various tasks for a household, including house sitting, coordinating workers, handling mail, and interacting with other staff. She invoices for her services.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as "MR EPSTEIN" and "Jeffrey E. Epstein". The document notes his travel schedule impacting appointments and lists his name on the final page.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to as "MS MAXWELL". Nicole Hesse met with her to discuss house repairs, and Maxwell made a partial payment towards Hesse's invoice.

persons.name: Christoph
persons.context: Nicole Hesse picked him up and drove him to the house to get a Mercedes unlocked, then drove him back to Jet Aviation.

persons.name: Larry
persons.context: Listed among workers at the house for cars/garage/outside landscape work.

persons.name: Christof
persons.context: Listed alongside Larry for cars/garage/outside landscape work.

persons.name: Douglas
persons.context: An architect listed among workers at the house in December 2003.

persons.name: Gerome
persons.context: A worker mentioned multiple times in January/February 2004 for tasks around the house.

persons.name: Alan
persons.context: From Cassidy Air, mentioned in the context of checking an A/C unit.

persons.name: Jeffery's Friend
persons.context: An unnamed friend of Jeffrey Epstein who was to borrow a Mercedes.

persons.name: Lynn
persons.context: Mentioned as being "out for trial" in August 2004.

persons.name: Jojo
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Lynn as being "out for trial" in August 2004.

persons.name: Lucia
persons.context: Her mail was sent to her by Nicole Hesse after an address change.

persons.name: Rushia
persons.context: Her mail was sent to her by Nicole Hesse after an address change.

persons.name: Lenny
persons.context: A worker who fixed a garden pipe and was requested to fix shutters.

persons.name: Richard
persons.context: Spoke to Nicole Hesse about resetting a house alarm in August 2005.

persons.name: Paula
persons.context: Listed as the password for an alarm system on a page of notes.

persons.name: Cook
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of an airport pick-up in September 2003.

persons.name: Peardon
persons.context: Referenced in the context of "PEADON CLEANERS" in a timesheet entry.

persons.name: Bishop
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of "BISHOP WATER" and called about a water delivery.

persons.name: Brent
persons.context: Mentioned alongside cleaners and an architect in December 2003.

connections.description: Hesse performed property management and staff coordination tasks for Epstein's household, as evidenced by her detailed timesheets and invoices.
Hesse met with Maxwell to discuss house repairs, and Maxwell made payments towards Hesse's invoices, indicating a managerial/financial relationship.
Maxwell is involved in managing household repairs and payments for Epstein's property, as she met with Hesse and paid her for services.
Hesse picked up and drove Christoph to handle a task involving a Mercedes at the house, indicating coordination on staff duties.
Hesse spoke with Richard regarding resetting a house alarm, indicating coordination on security matters for the property.

events.title: Airport Pick-up for Cook
events.description: Nicole Hesse's timesheet notes an airport pick-up for a cook.

events.title: Meeting with Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Nicole Hesse met with Ghislaine Maxwell to discuss what needs to be fixed around the house. Maxwell paid Hesse $1,000 towards her hours.

events.title: Mercedes Retrieval with Christoph
events.description: Nicole Hesse picked up Christoph, drove to the house to get a Mercedes unlocked, handled the alarm, and drove Christoph back to Jet Aviation.

events.title: Alarm Check and Reset
events.description: Nicole Hesse received a call from security, checked the house, and later worked with Richard and an alarm company to reset the house alarm.

locations: Jet Aviation (mentioned as a location for drop-off/pick-up)
keyFacts: Nicole Hesse performed extensive property management and staff coordination for a household associated with Jeffrey Epstein from 2003 to 2005.
Ghislaine Maxwell was directly involved in managing household affairs, meeting with Hesse about repairs and making payments.
The document reveals a network of staff and contractors (cleaners, painters, electricians, architects, drivers) maintained for the operation of Epstein's property.
Specific security details are noted, including alarm codes and passwords (e.g., 'Paula').
The timesheets show a pattern of regular domestic management and logistical support, indicating an organized household staff structure.
